    • getCacheManager

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="13.0") default DefaultCacheManager getCacheManager(String name)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Multiple Cache Managers are not supported in the server. Use getCacheManager() instead.
